name: Mad Minion
description:
Minions got rabies!

Local multiplayer Game in a Supa-Hipa-Alpha-But-Awesome-Stage.
Made on the 48 hour Kolks Game Jam, with theme "EPIDEMY".

Description:

Your objective is to destroy the other player by contaminating the minions and making them attack your opponent.

You can contaminate the minions by grabbing the orbs and shooting them.

Made by:
Isadora Sophia @isadorasophia;
Matheus Mortatti @MatheusMortatti;
Leonardo Filho @LeoCVF;
Mr. Strings (AKA Pedro Stringhini) @PHString.
